mapper.sql: ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, NICK_NAME, SALT, STATUS, SEX, AGE, CREATE_TIME, REMARK, EMAIL, PHONE, QQNUMBER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from USERS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into USERS (ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, NICK_NAME, SALT, STATUS, SEX, AGE, CREATE_TIME, REMARK, EMAIL, PHONE, QQNUMBER) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qqnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update USERS

PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

QQNUMBER = #{qqnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT ID, USER_NAME, NICK_NAME, SALT, STATUS, SEX, AGE, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, CONTACTS FROM USERS ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.update: update USERS set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGE = #{age,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQNUMBER = #{qqnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
